import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Label, Col, Row } from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Control, Form, Errors, actions } from 'react-redux-form' const required = (val) => val || val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !(val) || (val.length <= len); const minLength = (len) => (val) => !(val) || (val.length >= len); const isNumber = (val) => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = (val) => !(val) || /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); class Contact extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values) { this.props.postFeedbacks(values.firstname, values.lastname, values.telnum, values.email, values.agree, values.contactType, values.message) const lastFeedback = this.props.feedbacks[this.props.feedbacks.length -1 ] console.log("Thank you for your feedback! " + JSON.stringify(lastFeedback)); alert("CThank you for your feedback! " + JSON.stringify(lastFeedback)); this.props.resetFeedbackForm(); } render() { return(

this.handleSubmit(values)}>
); } } export default Contact;
